remarks: Obsolete version of ~ mndpfo as of 23-Jan-2020.  Range of an operation with a left and right identity element.  (Contributed by FL, 2-Nov-2009.) (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement: rngopidOLD $p |- ( G e. ( Magma i^i ExId ) -> ran G = dom dom G ) $.
